title: Data Loading Helper Classes and Types
text:
source

DataLoader

 DataLoader (path:Union[str,pathlib.Path],
             metadata_file_name:Optional[str]=None,
             custom_data_loader:Union[Callable,str,NoneType]=None)

Load data from a file or a directory of files, while keeping track of the metadata.










Type
Default
Details




path
Union

path to the file or directory


metadata_file_name
Optional
None
name of the metadata file


custom_data_loader
Union
None
custom data loader function or name of module with custom data loader


Returns
DataLoader

title: haruspex
text: This file will become your README and also the index of your documentation.

title: haruspex
text:
Developer Guide
If you are new to using nbdev here are some useful pointers to get you started.

Install haruspex in Development mode
# make sure haruspex package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to haruspex
$ nbdev_prepare

title: haruspex
text:
Usage

Installation
Install latest from the GitHub repository:
$ pip install git+https://github.com/redam94/haruspex.git
or from conda
$ conda install -c redam94 haruspex
or from pypi
$ pip install haruspex


Documentation
Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub repositoryâ€™s pages. Additionally you can find package manager specific guidelines on conda and pypi respectively.
